what: Easy Access to Maryland Spatial Data
title: Easy Access to Maryland Spatial Data
text: goal mapmaryland ease access spatial data Maryland local, regional, statewide level.

title: Easy Access to Maryland Spatial Data
text: can install development version mapmaryland like :

title: Easy Access to Maryland Spatial Data
text: Currently, package limited number data access functions, prepackaged datasets, reference data index Maryland ArcGIS services.
code: library(mapmaryland) ## basic example code dplyr::glimpse(md_arcgis_index) #> Rows: 67 #> Columns: 13 #> $ name         <chr> NA, NA, NA, "GEOLOOM (Baltimore Neighborhood Indicators A… #> $ operator.abb <chr> NA, NA, NA, "BNIA", "BNIA", "BCIT", NA, "BCIT", "BCIT", "… #> $ operator     <chr> NA, NA, NA, "Baltimore Neighborhood Indicators Alliance",… #> $ city         <chr> NA, NA, NA, "Baltimore", "Baltimore", "Baltimore", "Balti… #> $ county       <chr> "Allegany County", "Anne Arundel County", "Anne Arundel C… #> $ state        <chr> "Maryland", "Maryland", "Maryland", "Maryland", "Maryland… #> $ state.abb    <chr> "MD", "MD", "MD", "MD", "MD", "MD", "MD", "MD", "MD", "MD… #> $ geography    <chr> "countywide", "countywide", "countywide", "citywide", "ci… #> $ source_type  <chr> "county government", "county government", "county governm… #> $ notes        <chr> NA, NA, NA, "Project specific server but includes overlap… #> $ public       <lgl> TRUE, TRUE, TRUE, TRUE, TRUE, TRUE, TRUE, TRUE, TRUE, TRU… #> $ services_url <chr> "https://alleganygis.allconet.org/allcogis/rest/services"… #> $ hosting      <chr> NA, NA, NA, "ArcGIS Online", "ArcGIS Online", NA, NA, NA,…

what: Format Maryland simple feature data — format_md_sf
title: Format Maryland simple feature data — format_md_sf
text: Convert coordinate reference system, convert invalid geometry valid geometry sf::st_make_valid, , optionally, erase water, clean names janitor::clean_names. format_md_crash_data works data frame crash data get_md_crash_data

title: Format Maryland simple feature data — format_md_sf
code: format_md_sf(   data,   crs = getOption("mapmaryland.crs", default = 3857),   erase_water = FALSE,   clean_names = TRUE,   sf_col = "geometry" )  format_md_crash_data(data, drop_code = TRUE)

title: Format Maryland simple feature data — format_md_sf
text: data Data frame Maryland vehicular crash data; typically get_md_crash_data crs Coordinate reference system passed sf::st_transform, Default: 3857 erase_water TRUE, use overedge::st_erase erase geometry intersecting md_water; Default: FALSE clean_names TRUE, use janitor::clean_names; Default: TRUE sf_col Name use sf column renaming; defaults "geometry". drop_code TRUE, drop columns end "code"

title: Format Maryland simple feature data — format_md_sf
text: modified version input simple feature data.

what: Get data from Maryland iMap — get_imap_data
title: Get data from Maryland iMap — get_imap_data
text: Get data Maryland iMap including Computer Assisted Mass Appraisal (CAMA), parcel data, Maryland Inventory Historic Properties data, variety water data.

title: Get data from Maryland iMap — get_imap_data
code: get_imap_data(   location,   nm = NULL,   crs = getOption("mapmaryland.crs", default = 3857),   ... )  get_cama_data(   location,   type = "core",   crs = getOption("mapmaryland.crs", default = 3857),   ... )  get_parcel_data(   location,   type = "boundaries",   crs = getOption("mapmaryland.crs", default = 3857),   ... )  get_mht_data(   location,   type = "mihp",   crs = getOption("mapmaryland.crs", default = 3857),   ... )  get_water_data(   location,   type = "streams",   crs = getOption("mapmaryland.crs", default = 3857),   ... )

title: Get data from Maryland iMap — get_imap_data
text: location sf, sfc, bbox object (object convertible overedge::as_bbox. Required. nm Layer name identifier used retrieve url md_imap_index based snakecase "nm" column; Default: NULL. crs Coordinate reference system return. ... Additional parameters passed overedge::get_esri_data type Default supported options vary function. See details.

title: Get data from Maryland iMap — get_imap_data
text: Options type parameter: get_cama_data: Default: "core"; options: "bldg" (detailed building characteristics), "core", "land", "subarea" (building subarea). get_water_data: Default: "streams", options: "streams" (Rivers streams generalized), "streams detailed" (Rivers streams generalized), "federal watersheds", "8 digit watersheds", "12 digit watersheds", "navigable waterways", "ponds" (Lakes ponds) get_parcel_data: Default "boundaries", options: "boundaries" (Parcel boundaries), "points" (Parcel points) get_mht_data: Default: "mihp"; options: "mihp" (Maryland Inventory Historic Properties), "nr" (National Register Historic Places), "easements" (Preservation Easements held Maryland Historical Trust)

what: Get data from the Maryland Open Data Portal — get_md_open_data
title: Get data from the Maryland Open Data Portal — get_md_open_data
text: Get data Maryland Open Data Portal

title: Get data from the Maryland Open Data Portal — get_md_open_data
code: get_md_open_data(   resource = NULL,   type = NULL,   crs = getOption("mapmaryland.crs", default = 3857),   geometry = FALSE,   token = NULL,   ... )  get_md_crash_data(...)

title: Get data from the Maryland Open Data Portal — get_md_open_data
text: type Type data return. Supported options: "crashes", "road closures", "bay pollution reduction" crs Coordinate reference system return. geometry TRUE latitude/longitude columns available, return sf() object. Default FALSE. token Access token API Key; required access data Socrata.

title: Get data from the Maryland Open Data Portal — get_md_open_data
code: if (FALSE) { if (interactive()) {   get_md_crash_data(     where = "(year = '2020') AND (quarter = 'Q2')",     name_col = "county_desc",     name = "Cecil"   ) } }

what: Use package data or the tigris package to get Maryland data from the U.S. Census Bureau — get_md_tigris
title: Use package data or the tigris package to get Maryland data from the U.S. Census Bureau — get_md_tigris
text: Get package data Maryland counties, U.S. Congressional District, Census designated places name GeoID use tigris package download state data.

title: Use package data or the tigris package to get Maryland data from the U.S. Census Bureau — get_md_tigris
code: get_md_tigris(   name = NULL,   type = "counties",   crs = getOption("mapmaryland.crs", default = 3857),   erase_water = FALSE,   ... )

title: Use package data or the tigris package to get Maryland data from the U.S. Census Bureau — get_md_tigris
text: name Name matching value namelsad, namelsad, geoid columns md_counties, md_census_places, md_congressional_districts, md_legislative_districts, one data sets available download tigris; Default: NULL type Type data return, Default: "counties"; See details supported options. ... Additional parameters passed tigris functions.

title: Use package data or the tigris package to get Maryland data from the U.S. Census Bureau — get_md_tigris
text: simple feature object matching type provided.

title: Use package data or the tigris package to get Maryland data from the U.S. Census Bureau — get_md_tigris
text: Use mapmaryland packaged data use tigris U.S. Census Bureau API: Supported options access data included mapmaryland package include "counties", "census places", "congressional districts", "legislative districts", "water". Options access data calling one several tigris functions downloading data U.S. Census Bureau API include "senate district", "tracts", "block groups", "blocks", "pumas", "voting districts". tigris functions use "state" parameter (e.g. tigris::zctas)  supported function.

what: Maryland ArcGIS REST API Services Index — md_arcgis_index
title: Maryland ArcGIS REST API Services Index — md_arcgis_index
text: non-comprehensive list ArcGIS services maintained public agencies, academic units, nonprofit organizations Maryland. Layers available service_url can accessed using esri2sf package.

title: Maryland ArcGIS REST API Services Index — md_arcgis_index
Maryland ArcGIS REST API Services Index — md_arcgis_index
text: data frame 67 rows 14 variables: name character Source name operator.abb character Operator abbreviation operator character Operator name city character City name county character County name state character State name state.abb character State name abbreviation geography character Geographic scope; Options include citywide, countywide, regional (multi-county), statewide, regional (multistate). source_type character Source type notes character Notes public logical Public data indicator services_url character Services URL hosting character Hosting type; Currently used indicator ArcGIS Online hosted data services assumed self-hosted source operator.

title: Maryland ArcGIS REST API Services Index — md_arcgis_index
text: Comments, additions, corrections can submitted using comments open Google Sheet: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1c829bZdNqvbpoizulBU_XE5jVeNNck2kHkS-smpQ52s/edit?usp=sharing

title: Maryland Census-designated places — md_census_places
text: Census Designated Places (CDPs) state Maryland downloaded using tigris::places function.

title: Maryland Census-designated places — md_census_places
Maryland Census-designated places — md_census_places
text: data frame 536 rows 17 variables: statefp State FIPS code Maryland countyfp County FIPS code placefp CDP FIPS code placens CDP GNIS code geoid Unique CDP GeoID name Place name namelsad Place Legal/statistical area description (LSAD) lsad Legal/statistical area description (LSAD) classfp Class FIPS code pcicbsa Current metropolitan/micropolitan statistical area principal city indicator mtfcc MAF/TIGER Feature Class Code (MTFCC) funcstat Functional status aland Land area (square meters) awater Water area (square meters) intptlat Latitude internal point intptlon Longitude internal point geometry list COLUMN_DESCRIPTION

title: Maryland Counties (boundaries) — md_counties
text: County boundaries downloaded U.S. Census Bureau tigris::counties function. Counties Baltimore–Columbia–Towson Metropolitan Statistical Area (MSA) include Baltimore City, Baltimore County, Carroll County, Anne Arundel County, Howard County, Queen Anne's County, Harford County. Counties DC-VA-MD-WV Metropolitan Statistical Area (MSA) include Montgomery, Frederick, Prince George's, Charles, Calvert counties.
